availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Allen P. Mansfield (Logan County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Calista Covington Mansfield on March 20, 1832. Father of Elijah Mansfield and Washington Mansfield. Farmer in Logan County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 31. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 21. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Fillmore, p. 39. Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Logan County, Kentucky, 1832. Find A Grave, "Allen P. Mansfield (1810-1894)," Memorial #52273338, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/52273338/allen-p-mansfield (accessed November 29, 2017).
